mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_name, (d.emp_dept_name) AS dept, (select c.common_code_name FROM commons_code c WHERE c.common_code_idx = e.emp_grade_idx ) AS grade FROM employee e JOIN department d WHERE e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx AND e.emp_id NOT IN ("master") ORDER BY e.emp_dept_idx ASC, e.emp_grade_idx ASC
SELECT DISTINCT (d.emp_dept_name) AS dept FROM employee e JOIN department d WHERE e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx AND e.emp_id NOT IN ("master") ORDER BY e.emp_dept_idx ASC
